perf.fast-initial-drag.description: Enable optimized path to reduce initial drag latency in UI

feature.control-panel.sequences.description: Enable sequences flow in control panel UI

perf.drag.use-transform.description: Use CSS transform during drag to reduce first-frame latency; commit on end

perf.drag.defer-first-cp-burst.description: Defer the first CP update burst to avoid stacking with first paint

perf.cp.layout-eps.description: Increase layout EPS threshold to reduce jitter-driven CP updates

perf.cp.diff-only.description: Only notify CP on material diffs

perf.cp.render.dedupe.description: Dedupe UI renders post-drag within a short window

perf.cp.instrument.description: Enable input-to-visual latency instrumentation in dev

perf.cp.debug.description: Verbose debug logs for CP drag/update

perf.resize.use-transform.description: Use transform-based resizing during active resize; commit on end

perf.resize.first-delta.min.px.description: Minimum delta in px before sending first/successive CP updates during resize

perf.cp.resize-layout-eps.description: EPS threshold for width/height jitter during resize

perf.resize.microtask-first.description: Use microtask-first scheduling for first resize CP burst

lint.sequence-handlers.description: Enable ESLint rule that validates JSON sequence handlers against TS exports

lint.topics.runtime-validate.description: Enable runtime schema validation for EventRouter payloads in dev/test

lint.topics.warn-direct-invocation.description: Warn when direct conductor.play is used for sequences that have topic routes (prefer EventRouter.publish).

feature.enableRichHtml.description: Enable experimental Rich HTML component (sanitized pasted markup)

dev.json-catalog-fallback.description: Enable JSON sequence catalog fallback loader in dev/test when no runtime-mounted plugins are detected.
